text: This tree lists various manufacturing processes arranged by similarity of function. thermal oxidizer blends several manufacturing processes such as molding, forming, machining, etc. ==Casting== *Centrifugal casting (industrial) *Continuous casting *Die casting *Evaporative-pattern casting **Full-mold casting **Lost-foam casting *Investment casting (Lost-wax casting) **Countergravity casting **Lost-foam casting *Low pressure die casting *Permanent mold casting *Plastic mold casting *Resin casting *Sand casting *Shell molding *Slush casting, Slurry casting *Vacuum molding :Data from
